name: Weepingfalls
description:
When a young boy named Jimmy falls ill you must travel into a town abandoned after an atomic war to find the medicine he needs. Will you be able to survive long enough in this horror survival game?

WEEPINGFALLS is a short horror video game made with less than 24 hours worth of work put into it by using the "RPG in a Box" engine. 

Note: if you get stuck in the shop (with Gary) push spacebar when facing the door to exit!

UPDATE: This game has won the second Jimmy Jam contest held on the RPG in a Box discord server!
